name: Shoot Mania
description:
Shoot the boxes.. boom bam kapow...

In the world of guns and lasers, here lies a first person shooting game...

We have:

  • Laser Projectiles
  • A Matrix Background
  • Score increasing moving positive targets
  • Time decreasing spinning negative targets
  • Time increasing spinning bonus targets (shoot 'em fast)
  • Some color-changing superbonus targets(you gotta find out what they do ;p)
  • The "Time Dilating" pumpkins (hehahahaha)
  • Exhilirating music

**IMPORTANT**

1. Use external mouse for best feel and accuracy.

2. WebGL FPS games generally have a not-so-much accurate feeling of FPS, so try to play the various(Windows, MAC or Linux) downloadable version.

Instructions:

1. Use WASD to move

2. Use mouse to look and left-mouse/spacebar to shoot (You can repeatedly rapid fire as much as you want)

3. Use P to pause and resume or just shoot the buttons ;p
